FuncDef: The display radius-server accounting-interim-packet command displays the number of real-time accounting packets among cached RADIUS accounting packets.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IP address of a RADIUS server.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the name of a RADIUS server.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the number of real-time accounting packets among cached RADIUS accounting packets, run the display radius-server accounting-interim-packet command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
